## Upcoming deadlines

-   Statistics Reflection 10/6 11:59 PM
-   HW 3 10/13 11:59 PM

## Learning Objectives

By the end of the class, students should be able to:

-   describe (adjusted) $R^2$ and how it relates to model assessment

-   list the four assumptions of MLR

-   explain why we use residual plots to assess the assumptions

-   interpret residual plots
